channel.title: Need some help please!
channel.description:
Ok I am aloud to leech a friends server, he told me yeah sure, I dont care.
So I downloaded JDK 6 update 14 and Java 6 update 14 the latest versions. Then went to compiler and it says Note: Frame_Dub1.java uses or overrides a deprecated API Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for deatils Finished! Press Any key to continue.
People said then u compiled right. Then I went to client.java and hit ctrl f then typed in his server name and changed it for each time it said his server name into mine.
Now I need help because this is where Im stuck. Please help me!

item.title: Need some help please!
item.dc:creator: @Heveanlyrune Heveanlyrune
item.description:
@Heveanlyrune wrote:

So do I edit that into run or, make a new file on the unextracted or extracted files.

Dont get pissed of at me I aint the best at making or leeching a server Im just good at coding inside it lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2009, 11:47:39 am[/size][hr]Where can I find the command prompt and runeserver cmd?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2009, 11:55:44 am[/size][hr]Help lol?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help please!
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

Make a Compiler heres a simple one

@echo off
javac *.java
pause

Just make a new text file name it compiler.bat and put this in it.

The REAL command prompt hold all of your computers Data in it. The runserver cmd is the thing that keeps your server online.

Read full topic

To turn it off just exit the command prompt and to turn on click run in the server files

@_Ryan3 wrote:

Runserver should not be visible in your taskbar means its off. To turn it on click runserver.

item.title: Need some help please!
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

You don’t only compile client.java You just save what you changed. Then click compile. It will compile your changes. Then to restart your server turn it off. Then turn it back on.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help please!
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

  1. Edit
  2. Save your edits
  3. exit your server
  4. complie
  5. run server

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help please!
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

You said you compiled then edited it.

Its not difficult

Edit what you want in client.java or any other class. Save it. Compile it. Then restart your server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

You’ve changed it. Now compile. You have to compile after you change any .java file.

And yes you did compile right.
